title: Colorado Firm Recalls Meat and Poultry Products That Were Produced Under Insanitary Conditions
summary: Editor's note: This release is being reissued to include an undetermined amount of product produced under additional brand names and to clarify that the establishment is not operating at this time. WASHINGTON, Dec. 16, 2013 Yauk's Specialty Meats, a Windsor, Colo., establishment, is expanding its...
impacted_products: “Corner Post Meats” brand hams and bacon.
“Old Style Sausage” brand Smoked Andouille Sausage.
“Old Style Sausage” brand Smoked Kielbasa Sausage.
